name: DevoseCare Dashboard
description: Internal management dashboard for DevoseCare medical center (Feb 2026). Configured the project & build pipeline, implemented role-based staff permissions, login/logout flow, Kanban appointment board with drag-and-drop (dnd-kit), customer list management, CMS module for App content control, and UI/UX optimization.
impact: Delivered a full internal operations tool in under 4 weeks, enabling staff to manage the full appointment lifecycle, customers and app content from a single interface

name: E-commerce Farm Platform
description: Full-stack agricultural e-commerce platform. Developed responsive web UI with Next.js & Shadcn/UI, state management with Redux Toolkit, REST API integration with JWT auth and role-based access. Built cross-platform mobile app with Flutter (Clean Architecture). Backend: NestJS, PostgreSQL, TypeORM, OAuth 2.0 Google.
impact: Scalable full-stack system covering web + mobile with AI-powered crop disease diagnosis achieving ~97% accuracy

name: Homestay Booking Web Application
description: Full-featured homestay booking platform with search, filter and booking flows. Implemented real-time chat and booking status updates. Consumed backend APIs to display homestay listings, user info and booking details. Responsive UI optimized across all devices.
impact: Delivered a multi-role booking system (Client, Landlord, Admin) with real-time features in a 2-person team
